name: Italian Nutthouse Broiled Tomatoes
author: STEPHEN MCNUTT
summary: This Italian inspired appetizer is quick, tasty, and beautiful to the eye. Tomato slices are drizzled with olive oil, then sprinkled and broiled with parmesan cheese, oregano, and garlic.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
¾ cup freshly grated Parmesan cheese
directions: Cover a broiler pan or baking sheet with aluminum foil, and coat with non-stick cooking spray
Arrange tomato slices in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet
Drizzle each slice lightly with olive oil, spreading oil evenly with finger if necessary
Season with salt, pepper, garlic, monosodium glutamate (if using), and oregano
Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over the top
Broil, 3 inches from the heat until cheese is browned and bubbly, 3 minutes
